lines.text:
[having tasted the reconstituted alchohol that is offered aboard the moon base]
Mm... this is... awful.
The guys at R & D are getting pretty good at Bourbon and Gin, but the mysteries of Scotch continue to elude them.
So, Sorokin; inform on any close personal friends, lately?

[having been turned down by Kirilenko for dinner]
Oh, that's right, I forgot. You don't eat food. I'll have the infirmary send up a quart of warm blood.
Don't get Russian on me, Kirilenko.
